aws_appmesh_virtual_router.description: Provides an AWS App Mesh virtual router resource.

name.description: The name to use for the virtual router.

mesh_name.description: The name of the service mesh in which to create the virtual router.

spec.description: The virtual router specification to apply.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

listener.description: The listeners that the virtual router is expected to receive inbound traffic from.

port_mapping.description: The port mapping information for the listener.

port.description: The port used for the port mapping.

protocol.description: The protocol used for the port mapping. Valid values are `http` and `tcp`.

id.description: The ID of the virtual router.

arn.description: The ARN of the virtual router.

created_date.description: The creation date of the virtual router.

last_updated_date.description: The last update date of the virtual router.
